title: The Season Begins!
detail_text: <:th_ch0102/>Kanan-chan, you asked me to hold onto this for you...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ah, thanks, Riko-chan! I hate to ask, but could you put it over there for me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Sure. ...Hey, are you busy getting ready for Golden Week right now?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>That’s right. We have a lot of reservations! It’s the start of the season, after all!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>If it’s okay with you, would you like me to help?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Huh? No, it’s fine. It’s just heavy lifting.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Oh, you think I’m not strong enough?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Well, not exactly... I just don’t think it’s your kind of thing...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I’ll prove to you that’s not the case! Where do I take this rope?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Hehe, alright then, I’ll let Riko-chan spoil me. Could you please take the rope to the boat?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Leave it to me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>I’ll also need help with the life-saving equipment. Honestly, you’re helping me a lot. Once we’re done, I’ll treat you to anything you like!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Yay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
